actionpoints.text: Click this text to take a picture of something around you, like a squirrel.
This is a lot of information, it might even take up too much of the screen. There's a point at which we should stop, but let's keep going and see what happens.
This is some more information. Click this text to take a picture of something.
This is the next to last point on the trail.
This is the last point on the trail.
